resource

Class ResourcePool<R extends Resource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • resource.ResourcePool<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - Generic for a Resource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasketPool, CubiclePool

    public abstract class ResourcePool<R extends Resource>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a Resource pool which manages all the resources of the pool wheter there are availables or not
    Author:
    Alexandre LEFEBVRE - Thomas OSTROWSKI

      • freeResource

        public void freeResource(R res)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Free a resource by adding it to the list of available resources and removing it from the list of resources in use
        Parameters:
        res - The resource you want to free
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the resource you want to free is not a resource
